## Recommended book: Statistical Rethinking

> McElreath, R. (2020), *Statistical Rethinking: A Bayesian Course with Examples in R and Stan*. Second Edition. CRC Press.

Official links:

- {{< fa book >}} [Book page](https://xcelab.net/rm/statistical-rethinking/)
- {{< fa brands r-project >}} [R package](https://github.com/rmcelreath/rethinking)
- {{< fa brands youtube >}} [2022 lecture videos](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDcUM9US4XdMROZ57-OIRtIK0aOynbgZN)
- {{< fa brands github >}} [2022 lecture slides and homework and answers](https://github.com/rmcelreath/stat_rethinking_2022)

Translation with `tidyverse` and `brms` (online) :

- {{< fa laptop-code >}} Kurz, A. S. (2022), [*Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse: Second edition*](https://bookdown.org/content/4857/).
